title: numbering Font on football / soccer jersey
tags: soccer football nameplate jersey kit number nike
content:
file attached below.

some sci-fi / futuristic looking font used for number plates for football jerseys in singapore.

went thru dafont but couldnt find a match.

anyone?

comments.content:
Hello  
Please check:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Warlock-Regular.font?text=CHAMPIONS%2012](http://web.archive.org/web/20130630070135/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Warlock-Regular.font?text=CHAMPIONS%2012 "http://www.whatfontis.com/Warlock-Regular.font?text=CHAMPIONS%2012")

I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130630070135/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
